com.fasterxml.clustermate.service

Interface StartAndStoppable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BDBLastAccessStore, BDBNodeStateStore, CleanerUpper, ClusterPeerImpl, ClusterViewByServerImpl, ClusterViewByServerUpdatable, LastAccessStore, NodeStateStore, Stores, StoresImpl, SyncListAccessor

    public interface StartAndStoppable
    Simple tag interface, to denote Managed things but encapsulate details on interaction with the service.

    Note: while inspired by Managed interface of DropWizard, does not implement it, to keep interaction decoupled form DW to work on other containers as well.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void prepareForStop()
      Method called before stop(), and is meant to start graceful shutdown.
      void start() 
      void stop()
